modShortDescription: This changes the boulders (ResourceStones) in game to give you a small chance at mining: Coal, Potassium Nitrate Powder, Lead, Sand and Clay.
modDescription:
This is a small mod AaronG85 modified based on the work of Claymore.

This changes the boulders (ResourceStones) in game to give you a small chance at [mining](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-mining/): Coal, Potassium Nitrate Powder, Lead, Sand and Clay

This also gives you a rare chance of mining: Brass, Silver, Gold and Diamond

Also gives the ability to mine a small amount of iron from terrestrial stone boulders.

The percentages can be changed higher or lower to suit your gaming needs via the blocks.xml.

## Changelog

Updated for A20.

**[Download](https://apsnewcastle.com/AaronG85-UltimateRock.rar)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/28338-aarong85s-a20-modlets/).

**Credits:** [AaronG85](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/aarong85/)
